mapper.select: select * from (select member.*, row_number() over(order by 1 desc) as num from member) where num between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) as totalCnt from member

mapper.select: select * from member where user_email like '%${searchKeyword}%' or user_nickname like '%${searchKeyword}%'or user_phone like '%${searchKeyword}%' ${searchType} like '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' order by 1

select group_title, count(*) group_cal_cnt from group_calendar join (select seq_group, group_title from tbl_group) using(seq_group) group by group_title
select sum(count(*)) cntMem from group_member group by seq_group
select sum(count(*)) cntGroup from tbl_group group by seq_group
select sum(count(*)) cntCal from group_calendar group by seq_group
select area,count(*) as preCnt from site group by area

select to_char(b.dt, 'YY-MM-DD') as login_time, nvl(sum(a.cnt),0) loginCnt from (SELECT TO_DATE(login_time, 'YY-MM-DD') AS login_time, count(user_email) cnt FROM login_log WHERE (login_time >= TO_DATE(SYSDATE-7,'YY-MM-DD')) and login_status = '성공' GROUP BY login_time) a ,(SELECT TO_DATE(sysdate-6,'YY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL < = (TO_DATE(sysdate,'YY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(sysdate-7,'YY-MM-DD'))) b where b.dt = a.login_time(+) group by b.dt order by b.dt
